channel.title: Massively grow your user base with better emails
channel.description:
If you write marketing emails, my new product, SplashPad, may help you sell more and get more readers.
SplashPad helps you write emails that sell by providing language suggestions based on top-performing email campaigns. Use social proof, scarcity, empathy, reciprocity, and many more techniques from top performing email campaigns.
I would love to hear your reactions: Go to: www.getsplashpad dot com
